name: gnusb - open source usb sensor box
short_description: Open Source USB-Sensor Box. gnusb is a combined hardware/software project to provide a platform upon which users can build their own USB input/output devices, primarly for connecting Max/MSP and puredata to the outside world via sensors  and digital i/o.
